Hmm... are the games FULL version or TRIAL ?

I suspect trial since the notes for the torrent says: NOTE: ALL (or most - Not sure about Hexic HD and Totemball) OF THESE GAMES WILL SHOW UP AS A TRIAL GAME!!!,  if they got full functionality that would be great, but i doubt it.
Then i really dont see the point of this torrent.

you can burn them onto a DVD or CD (wont all fit on one)

or put them on directly on your HDD or mem card.

they will show up as trial unless you purchased them.

if you want full games, you should download the xbox live arcade unplugged vol 1 disk. (but thats only a few games.)  i might incorporate this disk into a future version.

the point of this is for people who don't have a hard drive (core edition) or want to save space on their HDD.

the readme.txt has more info.

I have Uploaded previous versions of this torrent (with less games)  the last one i did was 31 games.   this time i decided to zip each game so its easier to pick and choose, and simplify future versions of this torrent, as i wont change the current zip files.
another reason for this torrent is for people who dont have Xbox Live (for whatever reason)

As for the people that can't see the point of it, it saves space on the hard drive that could be used for videos or other demo downloads.
